entry.title: 0.8.6 release candidate 1
entry.summary: Drak inquired about a sticky post on Bitcointalk, asking if it was an official announcement. Jeff Garzik, a Bitcoin core developer and open-source evangelist, confirmed that it was indeed an official announcement. The link to the post in question was not provided in the context. Jeff Garzik is associated with BitPay, Inc., a leading global provider of Bitcoin and blockchain payment services.
